caption: there is a man that is sitting at a table working on something

keywords: too extended or overly flexed (fatigue if sustained)

caption: there is a woman that is sitting at a table with some tools

keywords: bent forward 20 to 60 degrees (causing increased spinal loading)

caption: there is a man that is sitting at a table with a coffee maker

keywords: standing on one leg (asymmetric load on lower body)
